game.name: Fallen Mankind MMO
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Good morning, loner. Welcome to hell. In Fallen Mankind MMO, Explore The Zone, survive deadly anomalies, and choose your path among three factions. Build bases, battle players, face horrors, and uncover secrets in a hardcore, open-world MMO inspired by STALKER and survival classics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Good morning, loner. Welcome to hell. In Fallen Mankind MMO, Explore The Zone, survive deadly anomalies, and choose your path among three factions. Build bases, battle players, face horrors, and uncover secrets in a hardcore, open-world MMO inspired by STALKER and survival classics.
